flawed_nl_solution:
Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=520>>520 pages.
Reading the first half took Jane 520 / 10 = <<520/10=52>>52 days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane 520 / 5 = <<520/5=104>>104 days.
So in total Jane needed 52 + 104 = <<52+104=156>>156 days to read the whole book.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250.0, not 520.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
